title: Archive: France v Italy - Euro 2000
body_text:
Archive: France v Italy - Euro 2000
This content is not available in your location.
There was an error
Relive one of the best European Championship finals as France claim a golden-goal victory over Italy in 2000.
Watch France v Italy in full, Friday 26 June, 14:00 BST, on BBC Two and iPlayer.
Watch Uefa Euro 2020 next summer across the BBC.
